response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that I believe would greatly benefit and enhance your endeavors. This product holds immense value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you surpasses my own attachment. I am offering you the chance to purchase this item at a special price of $950,000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between valuing the product appropriately and ensuring a profitable transaction for myself. I trust that you will find this proposal fair and attractive, given the significant benefits the product offers. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.", "product_price": 950000}
